Production Co: Watch This Ready, 199 Productions, Paramount Pictures, Fifth Season, Tempesta Films
Rating: PG-13 (Some Suggestive References|Some Drug Content|Brief Strong Language)
Synopsis: 80 FOR BRADY is inspired by the true story of four best friends living life to the fullest when they take a wild trip to the 2017 Super Bowl LI to see their hero Tom Brady play.
Title: 80 for Brady
